description: Time when the data was collected. Timezone: America/Regina. Equivalent to Central standard Time (North America) without saving time or also equivalent to UTC-6
name/code of the plot in the B4WarmED project where the measurement was collected

level of the warming treatment applied to the plot of this measurement. “AmbT” in case of plots growing at the natural ambient temperature, and “+3.4C” in case of warmed plots that were warmed at 3.4C above the ambient natural temperature
Indicates if the soil was actively warming during the moment of the measurement
Depth where the measurement was collected

sensorMakeModel: Thermocouples type T and AMT25 multiplexer (Campbell Scientific, Logan, Utah, USA)
